For My

Regan

Every still, every qoute, every moment I’ve collected here reminds me of the moments we have shared and all that reminds me of you. No amount of words could ever describe how much it has all meant to me, but I hope when you see this, you can feel just how much I adore you, how deeply you exist in every corner of my mind.

I am so, so very proud of you. I see how hard you work, how much of yourself you give to everything you do. everyone you care for, and it leaves me in awe every time. Nothing I do could ever match the heart you put into the world. But if I can remind you, even for a second, of how special you are, then maybe that’s enough. I could dedicate my life to that.

In the mine for love
